quote: No, there wasn’t "check out a sex tape". It was just take a look at the person that she built up to be this wonderful Girl Scout who was no Girl Scout.
quotePlain: No, there wasn’t “check out a sex tape”. It was just take a look at the person that she built up to be this wonderful Girl Scout who was no Girl Scout.
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: That’s ridiculous. While Trump did urge his Twitter followers to check out Machado’s "past," he literally wrote "check out sex tape" in the tweet.
checks.quotePlain: That’s ridiculous. While Trump did urge his Twitter followers to check out Machado’s “past,” he literally wrote “check out sex tape” in the tweet.

claims.title: Trump never told people to check out a sex tape of Alicia Machado
claims.negative: Trump told people to check out a sex tape of Alicia Machado
claims.negativePlain: Trump told people to check out a sex tape of Alicia Machado
